::: {#exr-cat-cost-radio}
Solve this matrix equation for $x$. 

$$\left(\begin{array}{r} 
-7 & 0 & 5 \\ 
5 & 7 & 2 \\ 
-5 & 4 & 7 \\ 
-5 & 0 & -9 \\ 
\end{array}\right) \ {\bf x}\ =
\left(\begin{array}{r} 
 6 \\ 
-4 \\ 
-1 \\ 
9 \\ 
\end{array}\right)$$


`r devoirs_text("solve-a")`
